name: Portrait mode
instructions:
1) Move the device into PORTRAIT mode.
2) Click 'GO'!
expected result: See green colored line on the device screen.

name: Landscape mode
instructions:
1) Move the device into LANDSCAPE mode.
2) Click 'GO'!
expected result: See green colored line on the device screen.

name: Preconditions
instructions:
1) Hold the device in PORTRAIT mode!
2) For the next tests hold the device in PORTRAIT mode (until told otherwise)!
3) Click 'GO'!
expected result: See green colored line on the device screen.

name: onCallEvent   after initiateVoiceCall gets correct CallRecordType
instructions:
1) Click 'GO'.
2) A call will be initiated.
3) Hang up after a bit (if onCallEvent fires test will succeed, timeout otherwise)
expected result: See green colored line on the device screen.

instructions:

2) A call will be initiated.
3) Hang up after a bit (if onCallEvent fires test will succeed, timeout otherwise)
expected result: See green colored line on the device screen.
